headline: Corning Announces Quarterly Dividend
summary: CORNING, N.Y., February 11, 2026--Corning Incorporated’s (NYSE: GLW) Board of Directors today declared a quarterly dividend of $0.28 per share. The dividend will be payable on March 30, 2026, to shareholders of record on February 27, 2026.

headline: Corning (GLW) Is Up 13.6% After Strong 2025 Results And $6 Billion Meta AI Fiber Deal
summary: Corning Incorporated reported past fourth-quarter 2025 results with sales of US$4,215 million and net income of US$540 million, while full-year 2025 sales reached US$15.63 billion and net income was US$1.60 billion, all higher than the prior year. Alongside this, Corning’s multiyear agreement of up to US$6 billion to supply Meta’s AI-focused fiber-optic infrastructure has sharply increased the importance of its Optical Communications segment within the business mix. We’ll now examine how...

headline: 2 Profitable Stocks to Target This Week and 1 We Brush Off
summary: While profitability is essential, it doesn’t guarantee long-term success. Some companies that rest on their margins will lose ground as competition intensifies - as Jeff Bezos said, "Your margin is my opportunity".
